^(identity_provider_id)$.description:
This value should be 4-63 characters, and valid characters
 are /[a-z][0-9]-/.
^(identity_provider_id)$.title:
The ID to use for the identity provider, which will become the final component of
 the identity provider's resource name.

^(validate_only)$.description: If set to true, the request will be validated without actually creating the identity provider.
